scripts.zip-all: cp scrape-all.mjs index.mjs && zip -r scrape-all.zip . -i index.mjs
scripts.zip-california: cp california.mjs index.mjs && zip -r california.zip . -i 'node_modules/*'  -i index.mjs -i utils.mjs
